rows.label: tlk46400078_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Since Fan-sama passed away, I
feel the people have grown less
accepting of the refugees.

rows.label: tlk46400078_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Perhaps it is only human nature. When
we feel sadness or frustration, we
lash out at the nearest targets.

rows.label: tlk46400078_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I only hope that the people of Acedia
can hold on to the ideals of harmony and
forgiveness that define this nation.
